WOW! These are the real Hackers! 

I am blown away by how great the live coding performances are with this tool. Checkout the examples that play right in your browser in the docs at [strudel.cc/workshop/getting-started](https://strudel.cc/workshop/getting-started/#examples)

I made a song today which you can see the code and play right here.
